name: Subha❤️
greetingText: It's been 23 years, Since your first cry!👶
wishText: Let's celebrate this special day and I wish to celebrate many more birthday as my wifey👸 :)
textInChatBox: Enjoy every moment of the life! Always stay happy and blessed forever...
text2: I was thinking🤔 how to make this day more memorable!
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
